title: Embroidered Picture, 1800
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in speckling, running and satin stitches on plain weave
dimensions: Frame H x W: 22.9 x 36.2 cm (9 x 14 1/4 in.)
description: Picture of Warwick Castle in a landscape in silk on cream foundation. Glazed and framed with eglomisé glass.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1800.
1800. Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in speckling, running and satin stitches on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. H.P. Davison. 1974-72-10.
